text:
MELTDOWN? .. After a bad couple of years of bomb movies and other drama, sources say Tom Cruise has become a recluse.

An insider says, “people close to him have barely heard a word from him …. It’s very bizarre behavior …. He’s a fairly social guy and its making people wonder”
title: Tom Cruise has become a recluse!

og.title: Tom Cruise has become a recluse! - Naughty Gossip
